channel.title: Python on Kevin Darlington
channel.description: Recent content in Python on Kevin Darlington

item.title: Bitpim contacts CSV to google voice/gmail CSV
item.description: I’ve had Google Voice for a while and I wanted to transfer my list of contacts from my phone to it. So, I decided to make a simple python script to convert the CSV contacts export from Bitpim to something that Google voice could import.

item.title: Heroes of Newerth player stats python script
item.description: Here is a script I made a long time ago when Heroes of Newerth first released its beta. It simply retrieves all of the player’s statistics given their player name.

item.title: Workclipmini - Copy text and open URLs from one computer to another
item.description: My computer setup at home involves two computers. The first computer is my quad core workhorse. I do all my programming and gaming on this machine. My second computer is my chat/fileserver machine. I use this primiarly as a backup computer and so I can talk to people while gaming or programming.

item.title: Rconsoft - HL1 chat command rcon tool
item.description: A long time ago (a few years), I used to play a lot of counter-strike with a few friends. We used to do a lot of scrimmages and matches (cal-m). One thing we were tired of was having to find a scrim via IRC. My brilliant friend, James, decided to make a tool that would automatically find scrims for us.
